physical_appearance:The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There is a single set of railroad that is visible in the image. The railroad proceeds in a straight line after a curve to the right
 from the background of the photograph at the top left hand side. There are short barriers on the left and right hand side of the image. The left half of the photograph is altered to be blurry and distorted.

sgcool_label_text:\This image is part of the \\Tracking Memories\\ collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore

metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There is a single set of railroad that is visible in the image. The railroad proceeds in a straight line after a curve to the right, from the background of the photograph at the top left hand side. There are short barriers on the left and right hand side of the image. The left half of the photograph is altered to be blurry and distorted.
